overview: Story about the journey of a Japanese girl named Ichigo who travels to Malaysia for a vacation along with a tour group from his country through a travel package by Strawberry Vanilla Travel & Tours. As the secrets of Malaysia's beauty are revealed to them, Ichigo is also shown to harbour secrets of her own. Her true intention of travelling to Malaysia is to search for something that has long eluded his life...
tagline: Ask The Heart, Do You Feel The Love [Tanya Sama Hati, Ada Rasa Cinta]
title: Strawberi Cinta
